unnormalised: Don't forget to file your ITR before 31/07/2024 to avoid a late fee u/s 234F, which can be ₹5000 if your income is above ₹5 lakh. Also, make sure your Form 26AS matches your declared income!
normalised: Don't forget to file your I-T-R before thirty first july two thousand and twenty four to avoid a late fee under section two three four F, which can be rupee five thousand if your income is above rupee five lakh. Also, make sure your Form twenty six A-S matches your declared income!
